name: Top Local Talkers
sql: SELECT VLAN_ID, IP_PROTOCOL_VERSION, IPv4NumToString(IPV4_ADDR) IPV4_ADDR_FORMATTED, IPv6NumToString(IPV6_ADDR) IPV6_ADDR_FORMATTED, HOST_LABEL, SUM(BYTES) total_bytes FROM (SELECT VLAN_ID, IP_PROTOCOL_VERSION, IPV4_SRC_ADDR IPV4_ADDR, IPV6_SRC_ADDR IPV6_ADDR, SRC_LABEL HOST_LABEL, TOTAL_BYTES BYTES FROM flows $WHERE$ AND CLIENT_LOCATION=1 UNION ALL SELECT VLAN_ID, IP_PROTOCOL_VERSION, IPV4_DST_ADDR IPV4_ADDR, IPV6_DST_ADDR IPV6_ADDR, DST_LABEL HOST_LABEL, TOTAL_BYTES BYTES FROM flows $WHERE$ AND SERVER_LOCATION=1) AS f $GROUPBY$ $ORDERBY$ $LIMIT$
